text:
Hi,
Your prcies are great and the sevrice is excellent. Very happy with my purchase and delivery timeframe to Australia.
However, I wasn't sure if your website was a legitimate service or if the sunglasses we're knock-off's. As an Australian, the prices for Italian eyewear are very expensive here, so too see your price I wasn't sure. I reviewed the Whirlpool forum which confirmed your legitimate service.
Keep up the great work!
Cheers,
Adam
